```{r loadPackage}
library(simBM)
library(knitr)
```

Here is an example of simulating length=1000 2D Brownian Motion and plot it.
```{r Example}
n=1000
sigma=1

bm=simBM(n=n,sigma=sigma)
plotBM(bm)
```
